There is the feature in Q5 to create look directions ("look west") . The problem is, that the player does not see these special exits in the game, not in the "places and objects"-list, not in the compass, nor in the gamewindow. So its a piece of luck, that the player types this look-command. So what would be a good solution for this problem? Show the exits in the compass? Displaying something like 
"...
You can go west or south. 
You can look: west" 
in the gamewindow? Any hints?
